text: DWAO-TV Ultra High Frequency (UHF) Channel 37 is the flagship news and public service television station of the Filipino-based company Progressive Broadcasting Corporation (PBC). ==Digital television== ===Digital channels=== UHF Channel 38 (617.143 MHz) Channel Video Aspect PSIP Short Name Programming Note 55.01 480i 16:9 UNTV-1 UNTV Test Broadcast 55.02 1080i STV Social Television 55.03 TRUTH CHANNEL Truth Channel Video Library (Test Channel) 55.04 KNC Kids Nation Channel 55.05 Accelerate Accelerate 55.31 240p 4:3 UNTV 1SEG UNTV 1seg ==Satellite broadcast== UNTV can be received via satellite in the Philippines and other countries in Asia, Australia, Middle East, Europe and Africa.
